HSPC Marital Status value set

SELECT SNOMED CT code system values descending from 'Finding of marital or partnership status (finding)' (365581002).

Copyright Statement: TBD

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 365581002
